	allowSchemaDrift: true,

	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'cseo',
	folderPath: 'standardized/transactional/msx/hub_vw_competitor/v1/standard') ~> MSXcompetior

	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
